# smoothLRC <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" width="25%"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Smooth Low-Rank Clustering (smoothLRC) provides tools to analyze and cluster spatial transcriptomics data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of smoothLRC from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alexanderjwhite/smoothLRC")
```

## Articles

Please visit the [smoothLRC documentation website](https://alexanderjwhite.github.io/smoothLRC/) for details.
